mapper.select: SELECT T1.customerKey ,T1.customerId ,T1.customerPw ,password(#{inCustomerPw}) As inCustomerPw ,T1.customerName ,T1.customerKey1 ,T1.customerKey2 ,T1.customerKey3 ,T1.customerKey4 ,T1.customerKey5 ,T1.customerKey6 ,T1.customerKey7 ,T1.customerKey8 ,T1.customerKey9 ,T1.customerKey10 ,Case When T3.groupId is not null Then 'Y' Else 'N' End staffYn FROM smCustomer T1 Left Join ofUser T2 On T1.customerKey=T2.mobliePhone Left Join ofGroup T3 On T2.groupId = T3.groupId And T3.smartYn='Y' WHERE T1.customerKey = #{customerKey}
